noTeamComponent.jql: project = Quarkus AND (component not in ('team/eng', 'team/cee', 'team/docs', 'team/ibm', 'team/mktg', 'team/pm', 'team/pgm', 'team/prod', 'team/qe') OR component is EMPTY) AND status != closed
noTeamComponent.description: Issue has no Team component. Please update the component field with one (or more) of: 'team/eng', 'team/cee', 'team/docs', 'team/ibm', 'team/mktg', 'team/pm', 'team/pgm', 'team/prod', 'team/qe'

noAssigneeWhenInProgress.jql: project = Quarkus AND status in ('Analysis in Progress', 'Dev In Progress') AND assignee is EMPTY
noAssigneeWhenInProgress.description: Issue is marked as in progress, but there is no assignee. The assignee should be set to the primary person who is working on this

erroneousLabel.description: This issue appears to be using a label with a typo. Notice the ',' after one of the labels. This is a problem, as the erroneous label appears as an option in autocomplete, encouraging further errors. Please can you update it to remove the ',' character?

missingVersion.jql: project = Quarkus AND fixVersion is EMPTY AND status not in ('To Do', 'Analysis in Progress', 'closed') AND (component not in (code.quarkus) or component is Empty)
missingVersion.description: This issue is in progress or completed so should have a fixVersion set. Please set the fix version, or reply to this email if you are unsure what fix version to set

versionedCodeQuarkusIssues.jql: project = Quarkus AND (fixVersion is NOT EMPTY OR affectedVersion is not EMPTY) AND component in (code.quarkus)
versionedCodeQuarkusIssues.description: Issues with the code.quarkus component should not be assigned a fix version or affects version as they represent issues with the https://code.quarkus.redhat.com service, rather than a particular RHBoQ code release

missingGA.jql: project = quarkus and fixVersion !~ '*.ga' AND fixVersion != 'Ongoing Prod'
missingGA.description: This issue seems to have a fixVersion set to a particular product release, but is missing the GA release it targets. Please respond to this email if you are unure what GA release to add to the fixVersion field.
